author: Terry Jack
text:
Does anyone have sample RFPs / solicitation documents used for procurement for opening, managing, an closing a municipal pool program?  This would include hiring and managing lifeguards, handling all the chemical requirements including purchase of the required chemicals, purchase, installation, and maintenance of filters, heaters, pumps, etc., furniture and swim program equipment, and whatever else goes into running a pool program.  
2)     What companies/organizations in the Trenton vicinity are doing this type of work?
3)  What are the requirements for insurance, licenses, certifications, bonding, etc.?
4)  What issues should the city consider before outsourcing their pool program?
title: Outsourcing Municipal Pool Management
